alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 06 at 10:55AM CST until February 07 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Mississippi... Pascagoula At Merrill affecting Greene, Jackson and George Counties. For the Pascagoula River...including Merrill...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pascagoula At Merrill. * WHEN...From Monday morning to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 22 feet, Flood Stage. Water approaches homes in west Merrill. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CST Sunday the stage was 21.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 22 feet tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 22 feet. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
